bounce-port-link.help: Enable/disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this mac-policy is applied.
bounce-port-link.name: bounce-port-link

options.help: Disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this mac-policy is applied.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this mac-policy is applied.
options.name: enable

count.help: Enable/disable packet count on the NAC device.
count.name: count

options.help: Enable packet count on the NAC device.
options.name: disable

options.help: Disable packet count on the NAC device.
options.name: enable

drop.help: Enable/disable dropping of NAC device traffic.
drop.name: drop

fortilink.help: FortiLink interface for which this MAC policy belongs to.
fortilink.name: fortilink

traffic-policy.help: Traffic policy to be applied when using this MAC policy.
traffic-policy.name: traffic-policy

vlan.help: Ingress traffic VLAN assignment for the MAC address matching this MAC policy.
vlan.name: vlan

results.help: Configure MAC policy to be applied on the managed FortiSwitch devices through NAC device.
results.name: mac-policy
